p:
The test process consists of the following steps:
a
Precycle: cycle at 20 °C, 0.03 C rate, voltage range 3.5–4.95 V for 10 cycles, and read battery capacity information after battery charging and discharging cycle curve is stable.
b
Full charging: charge to 4.95 V at a constant current of 0.1 C, set as 100% state of charge, that is, 0% SOD.
c
OCV test: first, balance the battery at 20 °C for 20 h and record the open-circuit voltage. Then, repeat the process at 0, 10, 20, 30, and 20 °C for 2 h at each step.
d
Adjusting SOD: charge the cell fully and then discharge at 0.1 C to the target SOD in one step.
